thread.title: BRIEF-Bilendi H1 net loss group share narrows to 0.9 million euros

title: BRIEF-Bilendi H1 net loss group share narrows to 0.9 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Bilendi H1 net loss group share narrows to 0.9 million euros 
Oct 5 Bilendi SA : 
* H1 net loss group share 0.9 million euros ($1.0 million) versus loss of 1.3 million euros year ago 
* H1 EBITDA 1.23 million euros versus 0.01 million euros year ago 
* Full year revenue target raised to between 45 pct and 50 pct Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8929 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
